clinical_study.brief_title: Subanalysis in Patients With CARDIoLAMinopathy Enrolled to REPORT-CCM Registry
clinical_study.official_title: Subanalysis in Patients With CARDIoLAMinopathy Enrolled to Retrospective and Observational Registy on Cardiac Contractility Modulation Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: Observational, retrospective registry with acute and chronic endpoints

detailed_description.textblock: This registry includes patients who have undergone CCM device implant and due to the presence of heart failure with reduced left ventricular systolic function and symptomatic despite optimal therapy, with LMNA-DCM etiology for to assess the impact on CCM therapy in term of improvemente of QoL and reduction HF hospitalizations

primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the effect of CCM therapy on Quality of Life evaluated from the reduction of MLWHFQ score at FU post implant of CCM device compared to baseline.

primary_outcome.measure: Reduction of HF Hospitalizations and Emergency Ward accesses
primary_outcome.description: Reduction of HF Hospitalizations and Emergency Ward accesses collected during the FU post implant of CCM device compared to number of Hospitalizations and Emergenncy Ward accesses collected 1 year before the implant of CCM therapy device
Evaluation of the impact of CCM therapy on Functional Capacity evaluated from the gain of the distance travelled in the 6MWT at FU post implant of CCM therapy device compared to baseline

secondary_outcome.description: Assess of HF biomarkers trends (laminine, NT-ProBNP, copeptine) during the FU compared to baseline

intervention.intervention_name: Implant of the device for Cardiac Contractility Modulation (CCM) Therapy
intervention.description: The intervention is an implant of CCM therapy devices and it is similar to conventional dual chamber cardiac devices with only difference of to insert n 2 leads fixed in right ventricular septum

study_pop.textblock: Patients with standard indication to CCM therapy device implantation with Cardiolaminopahy aetiology and in HF status.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Head of UOSD Elettrofisiologia Studio e Terapia delle Aritmie
